snippet.title: What does your cat do when you’re not around?
snippet.description: ...Even though we domesticated them over 9,000 years ago, house cats remain a bit of an anomaly when it comes to how we treat them. I cant think of another species we keep as a pet for which its accepted behavior to let them come and go as they please, even if there are a multitude of reasons why we probably shouldnt. Those of us who keep our house cats indoors have a pretty good idea of what they g...

snippet.title: My life as a cat: an hour with Terry Cavanagh's ChatChat MMO
snippet.description: ...The instructions underneath VVVVVV creator Terry Cavanagh's new browser-based MMO ChatChat simply read: "be a cat." These instructions also describe a dream I held between the ages of 5 and 7, so I'm eager to finally see if my dreams were realistic. Below is a short, diary-style description of my first hour as a cat.Warning: The following story contains major spoilers for what...

snippet.title: Earliest evidence of cat domestication found in China
snippet.description: ...There has been much debate about how cats went from hunting in the wild to being a much-loved pet; we know little about their domestication. snippet.title: DeMOGraphics: Cat Map plots locations, names, and colors of London felines
snippet.description: ...TheZoological Society of London(ZSL) has launched an initiative to collect data about the cats of London into a map. It's called, perhaps unsurprisingly, Cat Map.Cat Map invites mog owners or acquaintances to plot their feline counterparts onto a mapping tool, uploading a photo, an address, the cat's name, color, and age as well as a description.The map has been launched to raise awaren...

snippet.title: A dream come true: Become a cat with Catlateral Damage
snippet.description: ...First-person simulators are cool. Cats are cool. Indie title Catlateral Damage brings together these two cool things to make something even cooler: a cat simulator. You're a cat trapped... you live the cat experience first-hand. Punch and swipe things with your paws, sending them tumbling...
